data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 7,444 believers in Phetchabun, Thailand a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phetchabun, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Phetchabun, Thailand to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Phetchabun do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Phetchabun that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Lao Ngaew people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Phetchabun, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,136,256 lost people in  Phetchabun, Thailand have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Phetchabun unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

location.name: Phetchabun
location.cities_list: Phetchabun, Wichian Buri, Nong Phai, Chon Daen, Lom Sak
